entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
